body:
Hi Ludvig,

as you said there are some limitations for thermal analysis using outdoor shading in E+;

actually, the "OtherShadingType" allows you to "describe" your custom and complex geometry as you prefer...you should type you own IDF file  and adding to ADDITIONAL STRING into the E+ calculator component, here some examples of the IDF file:

[http://bigladdersoftware.com/epx/docs/8-3/input-output-reference/gr...](http://bigladdersoftware.com/epx/docs/8-3/input-output-reference/group-surface-construction-elements.html#windowmaterialcomplexshade)

It could be helpful if you could share some image or file of your shading..anyway please have a look at this discussion:

[http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/hb-shading-...](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/hb-shading-context-transmaterial-fails?commentId=2985220%3AComment%3A1471159&xg_source=msg_com_gr_forum)

I hope that this helps

Ernesto
